title: Debate night in Miami with Marc Caputo, Al Cárdenas & Ana Cárdenas-Navarro
description: Chuck prepares for the first Democratic Debate by sitting down with Politico's Marc Caputo. Plus, a sit down with Republican strategists Al Cárdenas & Ana Navarro-Cárdenas.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
